SEARCH
Package edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing

Class Stopwatch

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing.Stopwatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class Stopwatch extends Object implements AutoCloseable
A stopwatch that can be used to time some piece of work in a processing context and automatically add the time to the processing response.

It is closeable so that the timer can be used via the try-with-resources block: 

   
   try (Timer timer = start("process_step_1")) {
     // do process step one.
   }
